Sasuke lands a series of sword attacks on his opponent, finishing with an upwards strike that sends his opponent up in the air. While they're up, Sasuke sends a few Chidori Senbon, and finishes with Chidori Sharp Spear, splitting the spear into multiple ones after it pierces.
